metadata.subject: Tontine du pacte-social
Mutual funds
Annuities
Manuscripts, French
metadata.title: Tontine du pacte social, ou association survivancière établie à Paris, sous la surveillance des autorités constituées : hôtel Longueville, rue St. Thomas du Louvre : déposés le 15 juin 1793, chez Me Gaillard note. à Paris
metadata.creator: Tontine du pacte-social,
Tontine du pacte-social, author
Tolozé, author
Gaillard, Thomas
Pissin, G
Dépôt des lois (France)
metadata.description: Written on stationery with printed letterhead of "G. Pissin, successeur de Rondonneau et Dècle, place Saint-Germain-L'Auxerrois, 41." Rondonneau et Dècle operated in Paris until approximately 1820

"Expéditions certifiées des édits, arrêts, lettres-patentes, lois, décrets et autres actes publics, imprimés ou manuscrits, qui se trouvent dans le fonds de législation ancienne et moderne du Dépôt des lois"--Letterpress at head of manuscript text, page 1
Outlines rules, conditions, and benefits of investing with Tontine du pacte-social, formed by Tolozé
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title page and cover are combined. Damaged, stained, creased and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. No page numbers.
